title: League Wont Open
body: Im on windows 10 and have been playing League on windows 10 for a while now, but yesterday league just decided not open, it shows the icon and then goes away. I go to the task manager it says that league is still open, if I try to launch it again, it gives me the error that another client is already running which means that it is detecting that League is actually open but nothing happens. Ive tried soo many things, looked though a ton of threads, and foung nothing to help me :/ Plz help

replies.body: If you can see that League is still running in your processes when the actual game isn't open at all, go ahead and stop one of those stray League processes and it should close the others as well. Once all of them are closed, you should be able to get the game to launch.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=IE4q2f1t,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-05-27T20:52:23.518+0000)
>
> If you can see that League is still running in your processes when the actual game isn't open at all, go ahead and stop one of those stray League processes and it should close the others as well. Once all of them are closed, you should be able to get the game to launch.

Yes I have done this, and it just repeats the same thing and doesn't work. Thanks though :)
